Package org.eclipse.jface.dialogs

Interface IPageChangingListener

  • public interface IPageChangingListener
    A listener which is notified when the current page of a multi-page dialog is changing. Use this listener to perform long-running work that should only be executed once, when the page is in the process of changing, rather then during validation of page controls.
    Since:
    3.3
    See Also:
    PageChangingEvent

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void handlePageChanging​(PageChangingEvent event)
      Handle the an IDialogPage changing.

    • Method Detail

      • handlePageChanging

        void handlePageChanging​(PageChangingEvent event)
        Handle the an IDialogPage changing. The doit field of the PageChangingEvent must be set to false to prevent the page from changing.
        Parameters:
        event - event object describing the change
